Question
========
Which of the following best describes an Integrated Development Environment (IDE)?

Answerlist
----------
* A simple text editor with no additional tooling
* A hardware device used for data storage
* A platform that integrates code editing, execution, debugging and project management in one place
* A web browser extension for note taking

Solution
========
An IDE combines multiple tools—editor, console, debugger, version‑control, etc.—into one cohesive application, streamlining development.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
